com.adidas.ui.input

Class SingleInputStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.ui.input.InputStep
      • com.adidas.ui.input.SimpleInputStep
        • com.adidas.ui.input.SingleInputStep

  • public class SingleInputStep
extends SimpleInputStep
    The single input step attaches the input value listener and changes the button visibility.
